title.en: Nemuri ni Tsuku Made Soba ni Ite ~Watashitachi no Fujun'ai~

altTitles.en: Nemuri ni Tsuku Made Soba ni Ite Watashitachi no Fujun'ai
眠りにつくまでそばにいて～私たちの不純愛～

description.en:
This impure relationship cannot be discovered by anyone. We cannot talk about it. That's what I thought, but... he found out."

Tsugumi has been working for Apal Society for more than seven years. When she first started working at one of their stores, she had a really close friend who she could talk to about anything. 
"I fell in love with him, and I thought he felt the same, but when we kissed, we knew it was only a misunderstanding."
Five years later, she was assigned to her lover's department, and her old friend once again appeared in front of her.
